name: A Short Graves Visit
description:
My entry for #spooktoberjam

This is a small roguelite game, in which you are trying to visit graves and fighting zombies by throwing bombs.

This game include a WebGL build so it is playable from your browser. 

HOWEVER, it is strongly recommended to download the PC build and play that build. Browser builds are not always stable depend on the browser in use.

How to play:

1, WASD to move, SPACE to throw

2, If extra weapons are found, press 1 2 or 3 to select
